description:
Shāng Bù Huàn is stricken by the Princess of Cruelty`s poison, leaving him and Làng Wū Yáo on the run. Between the toxic temptress` attack and the and the ruthless pursuit of magistrate Xiào Kuáng Juàn, their quest to protect the Sorcerous Sword Index might be impossible... without some help.
Source: crunchyroll
